title: Pixel 4 XL with 50% battery problem. The warranty expired a couple of weeks ago. What do I do?
content:
This has been persistent for the past 2 weeks. The phone sometimes charges and sometimes it won't. If it turns on it will turn on with 50% battery and not move up or down even though the battery might be nearly at 1% charge or more. 

My warranty expired like 3 weeks ago to my great luck. Any suggestions?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
